column6: Are you free @ 11am-12pm on Fridays for our cohort curriculum meetings?
column9: Based on your long-term goals where does VCA fit in your path and what are you hoping to get out of joining?
column10: Tell us about a company or product you find fascinating and why?
column11: Describe a situation where you had to work with someone who strongly disagreed with you. How did you handle it?
column12: If you could have dinner with one founder who would you choose and what would you ask them?
column13: If you could get an honest answer to one question from any founder what would you ask?
column14: Anything else you want like us to know?

column9: I want to learn about VC
